tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_training_records (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50),
    training_type VARCHAR(50),
    training_date DATE,
    training_duration INT,
    training_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_training (
    employee_id UUID,
    category_id UUID,
    training_score FLOAT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, category_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_records(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES training_categories(category_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_training_records (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    training_name VARCHAR(100),
    training_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN
)
